text: In cold condition the mammalian body reacts in the following ways except

options.text: dilation of the capillaries supplying blood to the skin
constriction of blood capillaries in the skin
increased rate of chaemical changes in the body

subject: BIOLOGY

explanation.text:
Explanation
Glomerular filtration is the first step in making urine. It is the process that your kidneys use to filter excess fluid and waste products out of the blood.
Glomerular filtrate contains a lot of water, but also important molecules like glucose, amino acids, salts and excretory material, urea.

text: Legumes incorporate nitrogen gas into their proteins because

options.text: of the presence of Azotobacter in their roots
they possess root nodules containing Rhizobium
they have a well developed root system

subject: BIOLOGY

explanation.text:
Explanation
A characteristic of any species with only a limited number of possible values shows discontinuous variation (i.e It can only be a discrete number of values). Human blood group is an example of discontinuous variation. In the ABO blood group system, only four blood groups are possible (A, B, AB or O). There are no values in between, so this is discontinuous variation.
Here are some examples: blood group, sex (male or female), eye color etc.

text: Which of the following is an example of discontinuous variation?

options.text: the range in height of a pea plant from 30cm to 50cm
Offspring, including the two male cats and three female cats
the colour of pear plants grown in the dark
the adult body weight ranging from 50 kg t0 95 kg

subject: BIOLOGY
